title: request_files Lambda Output
description: The output for the request_files Lambda.

granules.description: A list of values representing the granules entered through input and their recovery status.

granuleId.description: The id of the granule being restored.

recover_files.description: A list of values representing each file that was requested for recovery.

key.description: Name of the file within the granule.

dest_bucket.description: The bucket the restored file will be moved to after the restore completes.

success.description: Must be true, otherwise an exception will be raised.

job_id.description: The 'job_id' from input event if present, otherwise a newly-generated uuid.
